title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 247.10 - Individual record of services
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 247.10 - Individual record of services

State Regulations

The New York State Education Department will maintain for
each applicant or individual eligible for vocational rehabilitation services a
separate record of services which includes information required by Federal
statute and regulation. At the time of application and as appropriate
thereafter, the agency will describe its policies on recordkeeping to the
individual, including the individual's right to access to his or her records. Should an individual request deletion or correction of a part of his or her
record, the agency shall do so if it finds that the item in the record is
inaccurate, but not otherwise. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
247.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
